name: FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN: {DEMO} DANCE NIGHT FUNKIN' MOD!
name_original: FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN: {DEMO} DANCE NIGHT FUNKIN' MOD!
description:
Greetings to all, dear itch.io users! Today I want to give you my DEMO mod, which is called Dance Night Funkin! (16+!!)

I'm sure you'll like it! 
Creator of the original FNF game: by ninjamuffin99, PhantomArcade
FNF + mod creator: blub.

And at the moment I have 3 weeks ready, but soon I will continue to create other characters! If you have any questions or ideas, please contact me! I will be very happy to listen to them :)

Thank you all!
